name: GoGreenSolar.com
overview:
In 2006, GoGreenSolar.com was founded and operated out of a garage, the website quickly became one of the top online destinations to purchase solar panels, wind turbines, LED lights and other energy saving products.

Since its humble beginnings of getting people started with green energy the website evolved into GigaWatt, Inc., a multimillion dollar horizontally integrated green energy corporation.

In addition to its core business of sales and distribution of green energy products through GoGreenSolar.com, the company designs, manufacturers and installs green power systems for both ratepayers and public utilities. The company is a California C-10 Electrical Contractor #972791

Our accomplishments include:

-Featured in Entrepreneur, Inc., greentechmedia, Renewable Energy World

-First company to supply CBS’s The Price is Right, a grid tie solar system as prize for the show.

-Helped build the world’s first grid tie solar bus shelter that produces over 1kW of AC power.

Our company enables you to:

-Get your green energy projects done on time and budget

-Procure green energy at prices that are competitive to traditional energy sources.

-Install solar panels beyond roof and precious undeveloped land by leveraging existing infrastructure within our communities.
